code: import{updatedObject}from"../../utility";import{types}from"../../actions/actionTypes";var chapterReducer=function chapterReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case types.GET_CHAPTER:return updatedObject(state,{id:action.payload.id,quiz:action.payload.quiz,articles:action.payload.articles,title:action.payload.title,description:action.payload.description});case types.GET_CHAPTERS:return updatedObject(state,{chapters:action.payload});default:return state;}};export default chapterReducer;
